definition: rendered competent through trial and experience, an experienced person who has been through many battles
details:
adjective
- rendered competent through trial and experience
= example: rendered competent through trial and experience
noun
- an experienced person who has been through many battles
= example: an experienced person who has been through many battles
- a person who has served in the armed forces
= example: a person who has served in the armed forces
- a serviceman who has seen considerable active service
= example: a serviceman who has seen considerable active service
